T06n2994u_001:17: (2) trayāṇāṁ (3) svabhāvānāṁ paratantrasya parikalpitasya pariniṣpannasya ca jñeyalakṣaṇatā deśitā |

T06n2994u_001:158: tena teṣv atya- niṣṭeṣu ta ālīnā na yujyante |
